allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve push notification delivery issues for all notification types

Fixed critical authorization header format issue preventing edge functions from being called by database triggers. The pg_net http_post function required headers as a separate parameter, not nested in params.

Changes:
- Fixed send_push_notification function to use correct pg_net.http_post signature with separate headers parameter
- Added detailed logging to all notification edge functions (mutual_match, profile_approval, profile_update) for better debugging
- Removed conflicting migration files that attempted to use wrong http extension
- Added service role key configuration via private.config table
- Created test script for debugging notification delivery

All notification types now working:
- new_match: triggers on match creation
- mutual_match: triggers when both users accept
- profile_approval: triggers on profile approval
- profile_update: triggers on profile rejection

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
